wikipedia_page.main:
Bruce Charles Aurelius Ellison (born 10 December 1969) was an English cricketer. He was a right-handed batsman and a right-arm medium-fast bowler. He was born in King's Lynn.
Ellison made a single first-class appearance for Oxford University in 1993, though he did not bat in the match, he took match figures of 2-40 with the ball.
Three seasons later, he made a single List A appearance for Oxfordshire in the NatWest Trophy, against Lancashire, taking three wickets.
